title: E-commerce API Documentation
description: Dynamic E-Commerce Workflow Management. Features dynamic routes for order processing, real-time inventory updates, and secure user authentication. Includes automated order reporting and product management. Documented via Postman and published publicly.

title: Course Booking API Documentation
description: RESTful API for managing course enrollments with user registration, authentication, and retrieval of user details. Supports course creation, updates, archiving, activation, and enrollment. Publicly documented using Postman.

title: Course Booking App
description: A MERN-stack course enrollment system with user registration, authentication, and profile management. Authenticated users can manage courses and enroll in available ones seamlessly.

title: E-commerce App
description: A MERN-based platform featuring a dynamic product catalog with filters, real-time search, cart updates, secure checkout, and an admin dashboard with analytics and user management.

title: Airline Booking System Mockup
description: Conceptual UI design showcasing flight search, seat selection, and booking confirmation with a focus on user experience and streamlined workflow.

title: Airline Booking System Prototype
description: Interactive prototype simulating full airline booking features such as flight search, reservation, payment, and real-time ticket management.
